parsed_response.implementation_notes: Added a clearly labeled circularity switch (Circ Switch) with value 1, modified both cash interest calculations to use IF logic with average of beginning and ending debt when circularity is on, preserved original beginning-debt logic when off, applied IB color conventions, and enabled iterative calculation settings to resolve interest expense circularity.
